name: Karthik K
my_business:
BNI Profile Brief – Anayon EV Charging & Virtual Solar
Anayon provides smart EV Charging solutions and Virtual Solar plans that help homes, RWAs, hotels, fleets, and commercial spaces cut electricity costs and adopt clean energy. We offer AC & DC chargers (7.4 kW to 120 kW), solar savings without rooftop space, and complete installation, maintenance, and 24/7 support. Our mission is simple — reduce your energy bill, power your EV faster, and make green energy accessible to everyone.
top_product: 1️⃣ EV Charging Solutions (AC & DC) AC Chargers: 7.4 kW AC Charger 11 kW AC Charger 22 kW AC Charger DC Fast Chargers: 30 kW DC Charger 60 kW DC Fast Charger 120 kW Ultra Fast Charger Includes: Installation Commissioning CMS Monitoring Billing & Payment Gateway Uptime Management 2️⃣ Virtual Solar Subscription Solar energy without rooftop requirement Monthly bill savings through energy credits 36–60 month subscription models Perfect for apartments, tenants & commercial sites Zero maintenance, zero equipment 3️⃣ EV Charging Software & CMS Platform Real-time charger monitoring Remote diagnostics User authentication QR-based payments Energy tracking & reporting Fleet dashboard 5️⃣ EV Charging Infrastructure Development Turnkey charging station setup Site planning & load study Charger sizing & electrical design Commercial and revenue model design Operation & maintenance 6️⃣ EV Charging AMC & Service Support Preventive & corrective maintenance 24/7 technical support Field service technicians Uptime guarantee 7️⃣ Energy Analytics & Optimization Tools Consumption analysis Load patterns & forecasting Savings projection EV + Virtual Solar optimization
ideal_referral: My ideal referral is anyone who wants to reduce their electricity bill or needs EV charging infrastructure. This includes: Residential RWAs Villa owners Apartment builders Gated communities Commercial & Institutions Hotels & Resorts Malls & Shopping Centres Hospitals Colleges & Schools IT Parks & Corporate Offices Mobility & Public Infra Fleet operators Highway motels Toll plazas Logistics hubs Parking operators Ideal Connects Builders & developers Architects Facility managers Electrical contractors EV showroom owners CSR decision-makers
top_problem_solved: 1️⃣ High Electricity Bills Most homes, RWAs, hotels, and commercial spaces struggle with rising EB costs. Solution: Virtual Solar & Energy Optimization → Save 30–90% without installing panels. 2️⃣ Lack of EV Charging Infrastructure People buy EVs but don’t have reliable places to charge. Solution: AC & DC EV Chargers (7.4 kW to 120 kW) + turnkey installation + CMS. 3️⃣ No Rooftop Space for Solar Apartments, rented spaces, and shaded buildings cannot install physical solar. Solution: Virtual Solar Subscription → Solar benefits without rooftop. 4️⃣ Poor Charger Uptime & Maintenance Issues Many installed chargers stop working due to weak service support. Solution: 24/7 CMS monitoring, quick service response, AMC, and guaranteed uptime.
my_favourite_bni_story: My Favourite BNI Story — EV Charging & Virtual Solar A few months ago, I received a referral from a fellow BNI member for a small apartment complex where many residents had recently purchased EVs. Their biggest challenge was simple yet frustrating: “We have EVs, but nowhere to charge them… and even if we install chargers, our electricity bill will shoot up.” The RWA was stuck. They wanted convenience for residents… But they were scared of the cost and didn’t have rooftop space for solar. I visited the site, understood their concerns, and recommended a solution that surprised them: 1 EV Charger + Virtual Solar Subscription We installed a 7.4 kW AC charger, fully integrated with our CMS and automated billing. Along with it, we added Virtual Solar, so the energy used for EV charging is offset by monthly solar credits. Within the first month, something amazing happened: Residents stopped fighting for sockets. EV owners got clean, reliable charging. The RWA’s electricity bill dropped by nearly 40%. They started earning small rental revenue from the charger. The President of the RWA told me this: “Karthik, you didn’t just install a charger… you gave us peace of mind.” And the best part? Because of this one project, I received 3 more referrals for RWAs, a hotel, and a commercial building—just by delivering value through a simple, smart, and clean solution.

name: Lakshith Saran K.S
my_business: At ARAM SEI, our mission is simple: to give the gift of healthier living through our pure, cold-pressed oils. For over 8 years, we've passionately upheld traditional extraction and sustainable sourcing, ensuring our oils are as close to nature as possible. Choose ARAM SEI for genuine nourishment that supports your well-being and a healthier world.
top_product: When it comes to what we do best, our cold-pressed oils are at the top of the list. Were we have our own manufacturing to check and control the best and finest Quality of oil.
ideal_referral: - Person Who is interested in Getting into shape and wants a healthy life style - Hotels - Exporters - HIN Apartments - International School Canteens - Hospital Canteens - Food events - Caterings Company
top_problem_solved: Making Cold pressed oils is a TOP problem solved , A great example is the story of a family in Poes Garden who started using cold-pressed sesame oil & coconut oil. The mother, a homemaker, was on a mission to find healthier alternatives without sacrificing the taste her family loved. After making the switch, she noticed: Improved digestion for her husband, who no longer suffered from acidity. Better skin health for her son, whose nagging skin issues started to clear up. Enhanced flavor in her cooking, which her kids immediately noticed and enjoyed. This isn't a one-off case. Across many cultures, the return to cold-pressed oils is a story of rediscovering the direct link between traditional, nutrient-rich ingredients and better health. It's a testament to the power of a simple, pure product to make a significant, positive impact on daily life.
